title: Self-Interrogation Mode
description: Get real with yourself. No more blaming the past. Sit down and answer hard questions. Face the truth.

title: No turning back Mode
description: Remove safety net, burn plan B. Win or die trying. Pressure forces level up. Figure it out.

title: Obsession Mode
description: You want it now. You think about it constantly. It is part of who you are.

title: Boredom Mastery Mode
description: Growth comes from repetition. Discipline when nobody is watching.

title: Isolation Mode
description: Go of the grid. Stop updating people. Stop trying to be seen. Distance yourself from distractions. Focus on becoming better.

title: Ruthless Cut Mode
description: Stop tolerating what drains you. Let go all of the obstacles. People, apps, habits.
